item.title: Contact URSSI
item.description: Contact Information To get involved in the project, pelase contact contact at urssi.us

item.title: Workshops
item.description: The primary activity of the URSSI is to gather information through a series of workshops over 2018. The first of these workshops is coming together in Berkeley on April 10-12.

item.title: About URSSI
item.description: The URSSI was created as part of a grant funded by the National Science Foundation (NSF) in December 2017.
